src:
Oleh Soleh Terpilih sebagai Ketua BKPRMI Jawa Barat
02 Nov 2019, 09:45 by Novianti Nurulliah
BANDUNG, (PR).- Oleh Soleh, Wakil Ketua DPRD Jabar terpilih secara aklamasi menjadi Ketua Badan Komunikasi Pemuda Masjid Indonesia (BKPRMI) Jawa Barat. Oleh terpilih dalam Musda (musyawarah daerah) BKPRMI Jabar yang dilaksanakan di Aula Barat Gedung Sate, Jalan Diponegoro, Kota Bandung Jumat, 1 November 2019 petang.
Hadir Wakil Gubernur Jawa Barat Uu Ruzhanul Ulum, Ketua DPP BKPRMI Habib Said Aldi Al Idrus, dan perwakilan Bupati dan walikota se-Jawa Barat. 
Usai terpilih, Oleh menyatakan dengan amanah tersebut dirinya berkomitmen menguatkan jaringan struktur organisasi hingga level kelurahan,untuk menangkal radikalisme. "Alahmdullillah ini adalah amanah untuk memperkuat basis sosial  aktivitas pelayanan keumataan, utamanya program yang akan kami lakukan penguatan struktural," ujarnya.
Politisi asal PKB itu menuturkan, tak hanya soal radikalisme, pihaknya akan membangun kolaborasi bersama pemerintah kota dan swasta dalam kemajuan organisasi.
Selanjutnya, Oleh mengharapkan, agar program kerja kedepan dapat menjadikan anak muda untuk lebih proaktif melakukan kegiatan di masjid.
"Kami berharap agar kegiatan yang telah disusun nanti bisa merangkul semua kalangan muda, jadi anak muda ini nantinya lebih aktif melakukan kegiatan di masjid dalam rangka meningkatkan akhlak," ucap dia.***

Baca Juga
text:
By Soleh Chosen as Chairman of the West Java BKPRMI
02 Nov 2019, 09:45 by Novianti Nurulliah
BANDUNG, (PR) .- By Soleh, the Deputy Chairperson of the West Java DPRD was elected unanimously as the Chairperson of the West Java Indonesian Youth Youth Communication Agency (BKPRMI). By being elected in the Regional Consultation Meeting of West Java's BKPRMI held in the West Hall of Gedung Sate, Jalan Diponegoro, Bandung City Friday, November 1, 2019 evening.
Present was Deputy Governor of West Java Uu Ruzhanul Ulum, Chairman of the BKPRMI DPP Habib Said Aldi Al Idrus, and representatives of Regents and Mayors throughout West Java.
After being elected, By declaring with that mandate he was committed to strengthening the network of organizational structures to the village level, to ward off radicalism. "Alahmdullillah is a mandate to strengthen the social base of public service activities, especially the program that we will carry out structural strengthening," he said.
The politician from PKB said, not only about radicalism, he would build collaboration with the city government and the private sector in the progress of the organization.
Furthermore, By hoping, so that future work programs can make young people to be more proactive in carrying out activities in the mosque.
"We hope that the activities that have been arranged will be able to embrace all young people, so this young person will be more active in carrying out activities in the mosque in order to improve morals," he said. ***
